title: Memebusters - Recruiting Jungler for OOL & Dynamo Queue.  Semi- Serious
body:
Hey everyone, 

Memebusters is currently looking for a new Jungler
The aim is to play in the upcoming OOL and any other OCE tournaments. We will strive to win any and every game while not getting shattered over a loss. 

We're looking for someone that:
-Communicates ( Good Mic + TS3 required)
-Not overly argumentative/ takes constructive criticism
-Doesn't tilt over 90°
-Has a decent champ pool for their role.
-Not a 1 trick pony
-Diamond 5+  last season or High plat currently. 
-18 yrs old +

Once we get in contact we will trial you for a few games. Don't want lead anyone on too much so it will be minimal time for trialing.

If you are interested add me in game: Navi or Pussbag (Add Wolfgang during the day)
Cheers
